Item.Value: [Text:Ah! I was wondering when I'd hear from you. $NPC_11$ told me you'd be arriving soon. I'm $NPC_14$, the village blacksmith. Not what you were expecting from the mayor's wife I bet, am I? If you need anything hammered out, you come visit me at my forge, alright?][Name:Introduction]
[Text:Well, hello there! HOw's the day treatin' you $Name$?][Default][Name:1]
[Text:If you find yourself running low on ore, I keep a stock of it myself. It'll cost you, of course, but I promise I'll give you the best deal I can!][Default][Name:2]
[Text:Weather like this makes my bones ache. I hope $NPC_11$ has a bath running for me tonight.][Weather:Raining][Name:Raining|1]

[Text:The best part of the winter for me is looking out at the falling snow from the heat of my forge. Sometimes, I go out and just run around to cool off. $NPC_11$ says flopping down in the snow to make snow angels is undignified, but I've never let dignity stop me from having fun before!][Weather:Snowing][Name:Snowing|1]

[Text:Hey there, any chance of building us a place to work? I need a $Building_21$ if I'm to get any real work done around here!][Default][Once][ShopTargetID:2][UnlockItemID:140][Priority:50][Name:Forge_Request]
